name: Name
initial-modal-message:
Hello! I spent the past few hours working on this website, and I sincerely hope you will enjoy it 😉.
Here are some things I think you would like to know about it:

📍It uses a Service Oriented Architecture to fetch data from the API in a clean way;

📍It has a cool abstraction layer that separates the HTTP client from the requsitions (go check it out inside the services folder);

📍It uses some specific vue.js features, like a custom-directive to detect scroll (I did it this way because I wanted to show you that I know this framework pretty well haha);

📍It uses Vuex, for a better state management;

📍There are a bunch of e2e test-cases made with Cypress;

📍 It has also Translations, with i18n (by the way, you can switch the language whenever you want by using the select input above.

Sincerely, Luiz Ramos.
